name: Universal oil CLP 3 in 1
description:
Clean: safely cleans external and internal metal surfaces, neutralizes residue after shooting.
Lubricant: lubricates external and internal parts of the weapon, reduces friction of moving parts of mechanisms.
Protect: protects metal from corrosion, displaces moisture, creates a protective film.
Does not lose its properties at extreme temperatures from -40째C to +200째C.
useTo:
Unload the weapon. Run 3-4 patches soaked in CLP through the barrel. Make 10-15 passes with a brush
soaked in CLP. Run 3-4 patches soaked in CLP through the barrel until they come out clean.
After that, run 1-2 dry patches. Clean all exposed surfaces with CLP patches. Remove the lubricant
from wooden surfaces. In case of persistent dirt, use special cleaning agents from the DayPatron line.
For long-term storage or under unfavorable conditions, use Rust Protection from the DayPatron line.
composition: C10-C13 hydrocarbons, n-alkanes, isoalkanes, aromatic fatty acids, corrosion inhibitors.

name: Neutral synthetic oil
description:
has a neutral acid-alkaline environment. Due to its penetrating properties,
it cleans and neutralizes residues of combustion products after firing and provides
protection against corrosion and atmospheric influence. It ensures necessary lubrication
on all metal surfaces, including various types of small and large caliber weapons.
The oil is effective at extreme temperatures ranging from -40째C to +200째C.
useTo:
Unload the firearm.
Cleaning: Apply the oil to the surface that needs cleaning and leave it for some time.
Then clean it using regular cleaning tools and remove any dirt residues. If stubborn dirt
is present, use specialized products from the DayPatron line for cleaning.

Lubrication: Apply the oil to the treated surfaces, leave it for some time,
and then remove the excess oil using patches.
composition: Synthetic oil, cleaning and anticorrosive additives. Neutral pH level.

name: Rust Protection
description:
A unique product designed for long-term storage and use in conditions of high
humidity and salty air on all types of small and large caliber firearm metal surfaces. It displaces
moisture, neutralizes acid action, and prevents corrosion. It creates a dry wax film and maintains
a neutral environment. It does not harm plastic or rubber materials. Odorless. Provides outdoor
protection for 6-8 months and indoor protection for 12-15 months.
useTo:
Unload the firearm.
Prior to application, clean the surfaces with DayPatron cleaning agents. Apply the
lubricant in a thin layer to the surface and allow it to penetrate for a few minutes.
Remove any excess with dry patches, cloths, or brushes.
composition: C10-C13 hydrocarbons, n-alkanes, isoalkanes, aromatic fatty acids, corrosion inhibitors.

name: Carbon Killer
description:
is a new high-performance cleaner that instantly removes carbon deposits, plastic,
lead, grease, and lubricants from barrels, chambers, gas pistons, interchangeable chokes,
and other parts of firearms of all types and calibers. It is safe to use on all types of steel and is odorless.
useTo:
Unload the firearm.
Run 3-4 patches soaked in carbon remover through the barrel. Make 10-15 passes with a cleaning
rod soaked in the solution and let it sit for 3-5 minutes. Repeat the first step until the patches
come out clean, then run 3 dry patches through and apply Neutral Synthetic Oil DayPatron.
For long-term storage, use Rust Protection DayPatron.
composition: Mixture of aromatic organic acids, anionic surfactants <5%, amino alcohols, organic compounds of lactams class, C10-C13 hydrocarbons, n-alkanes, isoalkanes, aromatic fatty acids, corrosion inhibitors.

name: Copper Killer
description:
instantly removes copper deposits from all types of firearms, small and large caliber.
Neutralizes all corrosive residues. Safe for use in barrels of all steel types. Non-flammable, free of
ammonia and odor, non-toxic and biodegradable.
useTo:
Unload the firearm.
Run 3-4 patches soaked in the solution through the barrel. Make 10-15 passes with a nylon brush soaked
in the solution, and leave it for 3-5 minutes. Run soaked patches through again until they become clean.
Then run 2-3 dry patches and apply Neutral Synthetic Oil DayPatron.
For long-term storage, use Rust Protection DayPatron.
composition: Mixture of aromatic organic acids, anionic surfactants <5%, organic compounds of lactam class.

name: Liquidator
description:
instantly reacts and removes all types of fouling and deposits after shooting: carbon, powder,
copper, and others, in all types of firearms of any caliber. Neutralizes all corrosive residues.
Safe for all types of steel. Non-flammable, ammonia-free, and odorless.
useTo:
Unload the firearm. Run 3-4 patches soaked in Bore Cleaner through the barrel. Make 10-15 passes
with a nylon brush soaked in Bore Cleaner and leave it for 3-5 minutes. Run patches soaked in the solution
until they come out clean. Run 2-3 dry patches and apply Neutral Synthetic Oil DayPatron.
For long-term storage, use Rust Protection DayPatron.
composition: Mixture of aromatic organic acids, anionic surfactants <5%, organic compounds of lactam class.
